short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add this extension and get daily amazon quiz answers. Play Answer amazon quiz and win exiciting prizes daily.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
UffDeal - Quiz Answers Today extension helps you to solve 5 questions of amazon quiz time daily from 8 AM to 12 PM. 

Answers the 5 questions correctly and you could win upto 1 Lakh Rupees [INR] daily. Questions are available on mobile app only. Quiz winners are declared daily or they specify the date after complete it.

Answer Amazon Quiz Daily and tweet your winning screenshot with the hashtag #QuizTimeMorningsWithAmazon on Twitter.

**Answers are updated daily at 8:00 AM.
